product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Rechargeable Air Bed - Twin - Special Buy
long_description: Whether you're headed out for a weekend of camping or staying with out-of-town friends, bring along the twin-size ALPS Mountaineering Rechargeable Air Bed to ensure a good night's sleep. Industry-leading thick and durable PVC material makes the mattress puncture resistant; welded seams add extra durability. Reinforced bed construction provides a comfortable, uniform sleeping surface and the outer ring provides a stable edge support. Plush, velvety-soft flocked top provides a luxurious sleep surface and prevents bedding from slipping or sliding around. Included state-of-the-art rechargeable pump inflates and deflates; includes a car charger and wall charger. Inflates quickly and easily with the flip of a switch; bed will be inflated from start to finish in just over 1 min. Easily fits in most camping tents. ALPS Mountaineering Rechargeable Air Bed comes with a carry bag. Special buy.
short_description: Whether you're headed out for a weekend of camping or staying with out-of-town friends, bring along the twin-size ALPS Mountaineering Rechargeable Air Bed to ensure a good night's sleep.
